intro: Cyrtandra lydgatei, commonly known as the Lydgate's cyrtandra, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of the Pacific. Cyrtandra lydgatei exhibits a herbaceous growth habit with opposite leaves that are usually ovate or elliptic in shape. Its unique floral structure and habitat preferences make it an interesting subject for botanical study.
